fields.label: Details
fields.name: details
fields.instructions: Add pertinent details about the project

title: Background Image with Content

fields.label: Background Image
fields.name: background_image
fields.instructions: Upload or select image for use as section background. If link is included below, image will change to full color on hover, so be sure to upload a color image.

description: Full width image section with text overlay

fields.label: Shade
fields.name: shade
fields.instructions: Add light gray background to section.

fields.label: Component Padding
fields.name: padding
fields.instructions: Provide vertical padding for section interior when needed.

fields.label: Hero Headline
fields.name: hero_headline
fields.instructions: Add headline. You can wrap word(s) in <span class="yellow"> to color them with LeJeune yellow

fields.label: Icon Repeater
fields.name: icon_repeater
fields.instructions: Create row of icons. IMPORTANT: Front-end only accepts SVG file type for output, so make sure to upload SVGs below.

fields.label: Featured Projects
fields.name: featured_projects
fields.instructions: Select up to 5 projects to feature in carousel.

fields.label: Related Projects
fields.name: related_projects
fields.instructions: Choose up to six related projects

fields.label: Image Side
fields.name: image_side
fields.instructions: Choose which side the image will display

fields.label: Margins
fields.name: margins
fields.instructions: Provide vertical spacing outside section when needed.
